H0.text: In which year did Reference Point win the Derby and Maori Venture win the Grand National. 1985

H1.text: In which year did Reference Point win the Derby and Maori Venture win the Grand National. 1982

H3.text: In which year did Reference Point win the Derby and Maori Venture win the Grand National. 1987

A4.text: Reference Point won the Derby in 1987
